page.title: 17FARMING SAMPLE STUDIES
page.content: Cont. from page 16 cutter,grass turner,hay baler,4 ploughs,manure spreader,crop sprayer, bale elevator,corn auger,6 trailers, rotavator,cultivator and 3 harrows.The wheat and barley are harvested by a contractor. Daniel Martin Catherine Elden Age 12 Low Farm Low Farm Lane,Ackworth. G.R.:446168 Date of study:9th July 1985 Low Farm is a working farm which has been on this site since 1779 when it was founded by Ackworth School (private school).There are two farm- houses but only one of them is occupied at the moment.The name of the person living in the farm is Mr. Whiteley who is the manager of the
